reviews.review: At first this game is just frustrating since you don't know wtf you're doing, but after some time this game gets SOOOOO  addicting and fun to play with friends.        I don't know many people that play this game and the one's that do have this game are pretty inactive, so i have stopped playing for a while.         I definitely recommend this game, but it's only fun to play with friends in my opinion.

游戏是好游戏，但玩的人不一定好，屠夫玩不好被各种嘲讽，结束了就对我来一句无能狂怒废物，也不知道我为什么输了就得无能狂怒。假如我输了我就怒那是我小家子气，但你赢了你还骂你是真的狗。第一次玩游戏心情这么变差的。

worst fucking game on the fucking planet

This game is great and could be very fun to play but the community is full of monkeys so they absolutely ruin the skill gap and create this margin where shidders fit in to the high ranks and it's a catastrophe of monkeys with braindead strats to win such as camping, tunneling, survivors just hiding and not doing gens. It's quite simple to be good at this game so I'm not sure why 90% of the community plays like this. How can you enjoy yourself thinking you're getting better at the game by sitting there motionless. The fun of the game is looping the killer and im finding more fun and balance in propnight. Dbd is a great concept of a game and was built beautiful by design but I'm done with monkey gameplay. Never camped or tunneled and never will because that is some mindless gameplay and who enjoys that
It's a fun and scary game to play with friends.

It's more thrill than horror. I am not a big fan of horror games, but when playing with friends, this game can make you wet in more ways than one. I played it for a while on console and then moved to pc, and it is still just as, if not more, enjoyable, enticing, thrilling, and fun.

Игра просто наполнена микрофризами, багами и недоработками. Разработчкик нихуя не правят, а только выпускают все новые и новые обновления с имбовыми маньяками и занерфленными выжившими. При любом раскладе говнище ебаное.

Do you like bulling people, i a 85% working game then your in luck

- 62 fps lock. 

- Fun but repetitive.

- Survivors are way too overpowered, especially in red ranks. There is no balance, not even close.

- Toxicity, especially from survivor mains.

-  Gen speed, really strong metaperks such as DS, Unbreakable, Soul Guard, Prove thyself never got any nerf in years. But if a killer perk or feature is slightly good( not even strong), survivor crybabies start crying and it gets nerfed immediately.

This game is pure cancer because of its brainless and worthless developers. Better stay away and save yourself.

Hola, este juego tiene una idea muy buena y es bastante entretenido, aunque abundan los problemas.

Cosas buenas:
- Idea de juego, los supervivientes deben reparar motores para poder escapar abriendo las puertas, mientras el asesino tiene que intentar sacrificarlos a todos antes de que escapen.
- Variedad de perks, para cada estilo de juego.
- Jugar con amigos es muy divertido.

Cosas malas:
- Muchísimos fallos en las mecánicas.
- Hay una enorme diferencia entre jugar killer y survivor, esta completamente desnivelado.
- La comunidad es una auténtica ******, desde sobrevivientes que apenas los cuelgan por primera vez abandonan hasta killers que face-campean y tunelean o hacen focus.
- Como la comunidad es un asco, es muy difícil divertirse jugando solo, en especial como superviviente.
- Es casi imposible ganar al jugar contra killers como un doctor, a menos que sea muy malo o estes jugando con amigos.

¿Recomiendo este juego? La respuesta es no. Su comunidad y el desnivel arruinan completamente la experiencia de juego.

personally i give this game a 4.5/10, because every update brings more issues, the killer design isn't improving, the MMR is unfair for most survivors/killers, and the company, BHVR has been in some shit lately because of NTF and working with Epic Games, the game is ok, wish it was better, but personally i feel that this game won't always be a game i love. I don't have any positive or negatives, just a review.
